site_title: Simple Rose with My New Twist by Wilson Lee

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Today is another special piece. Today we will learn my new version of the Simple Rose. In this version I made some improvements to the simple rose and would like to share it with you. I stumbled across the simple rose and was instantly attracted to it. The simple rose is really beautiful. Once I learned how to fold it, I realized the rose was not symmetrical and I cam up with this solution. I hope you like it. This rose is designed by me, Wilson Lee, and it is base on the Simple Rose (Omuta Rose A) by Fumiaki Shingu. Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
